name: Numbers Addict Premium
description:
*** What is Numbers Addict ? This is a unique concept for a totally addictive game: bring down the balls, add them, anticipate next ones to reach the best score but also challenge your Facebook friends. For that, you must use your intelligence, your imagination, your reflexes and keep your head cold ! ***

- Simple and addictive: anticipate the next balls, sum them and make them all explode as quick as you can !

- Unique: This game is a unique concept ! You won't be able to stop playing thanks to this subtle mix of reflexes, mathematics and suspens.

- Intelligence: Reach the best score with a minimum of explosions.

- Social: with the Facebook connect, be always aware of your friends' scores and challenge them.

- 3 different levels that allow you to change your strategies to reach the highest score !

A video tutorial is available on Facebook: https://apps.facebook.com/numbersaddictthegame

In this game :
Amazing multiplayer mode
Retina Display
Intuitive & addictive gameplay
Facebook connect
HD on iPad
iPhone 5 optimized
